description: Sets the info for the satelite map on the compass.
*ðŸš© This documentation is for the IW3 version of this function credit to Raid Gaming and has yet to be reviewed/updated for IW4.*

params.name: material
description: The name of the satelite map material.

params.name: upper-left x
description: X-coordinate of the world location of the upper-left corner of the material.

params.name: upper-left y
description: Y-coordinate of the world location of the upper-left corner of the material.

params.name: lower-right x
description: X-coordinate of the world location of the lower-right corner of the material.

params.name: lower-right y
description: Y-coordinate of the world location of the lower-right corner of the material.
